verses.name: Colossians 1:5
verses.text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;

verses.name: Colossians 1:6
verses.text: Which is come unto you, as it is in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as it doth also in you, since the day ye heard of it, and knew the grace of God in truth:

verses.name: Colossians 1:7
verses.text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;

verses.name: Colossians 1:8
verses.text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
